member_organisations: STL has 10 regional member associations (http://www.taksiliitto.fi/suomen_taksiliitto/organisaatio/alueyhdistykset/) and about 280 local member associations (http://www.taksiliitto.fi/suomen_taksiliitto/organisaatio/alueyhdistykset/).
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: STL's main focus is on the European Union transport and traffic policy and other policies covering the road transport market. Areas of interest also include Mobility as a Service and the digitisation of transport. STL is also interested in EU initiatives concerning small and medium sized enterprises.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
STL works in co-operation with the Finnish Transport and Logistics - SKAL's Belgium Office.  
 
STL is a member of the Federation of Finnish Enterprises SY and International Road Transport Union IRU .  
 
STL is also a member of the following organisations: 
- Ammattiautoliitto ry 
- Ammattiautoliittojen Keskuselin ry (AKE) 
- Helsingin Kauppakamari (Helsinki Region Chamber of Commerce) 
- ITS Finland ry 
- Liikenneturva (Finnish Road Safety Council) 
- Mobilia Automobile and Road Museum 
- Moottoriliikenteen Keskusjärjestö ry 
- Nordiska Taxirådet 
- Suomen Liikennelääketieteen yhdistys ry 
- Suomen Tieyhdistys ry (Finnish Road Association)
goals__remit: Suomen Taksiliitto ry ( the Finnish Taxi Owners' Federation) represents taxi companies and dispatch centres. It has around 7000 members.
